function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of thermal face scans and AI-enabled cameras for temperature screening","Impact":"Potential invasion of privacy, misdiagnosis of COVID-19 symptoms","Mitigation":"Enhanced data privacy measures, validation of AI diagnosis with traditional testing methods","Technologies":"Thermal face scanning, AI-enabled camera systems","People":"Individuals being monitored, potential COVID-19 patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, AI technology developers"},{"Description":"Use of AI-enabled medical imaging for COVID-19 diagnosis","Impact":"Reliance on AI may lead to misdiagnosis or missed diagnoses, data privacy concerns","Mitigation":"Validation of AI diagnosis with traditional testing methods, data encryption and secure storage","Technologies":"AI-enabled medical imaging tools, CT scans, X-rays","People":"Patients undergoing medical imaging, radiologists, medical professionals","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, AI technology developers"}]}
